name: Middle Finger LORA
description:
Spent a while making this one. It suffers from the same issue as the gun LORA, where sometimes you get two hands and not just one. Actually, the solution to that is a simple fix, as I've learned recently, but for flipping someone off what's wrong with making it double, ya know? At least for this pose it makes sense, so it works.

85 (mostly anime or digitally drawn) images trained for 1K steps. Base model NAI, tested on various. Token recommended.

Images in preview may be from past versions! Do not expect full replication!
